text: @elonmusk We just bought r new Model 3 1st week of March. Wished we didn’t get it & stick with our BMW i3 for i4. You don’t care about people’s lives just for profit like #ImpeachedTrump. U have millions of followers & this is what your platform is about? #COVID19
